com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface DateCriteria

  • All Superinterfaces:
    gw.pl.external.entity.Entity, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, Versionable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface DateCriteria
extends Versionable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    A component used as part of a larger search criteria entity. Encapsulates the information entered by the user to restrict the search to a particular date range. Specifies the date field to be restricted and allows the date range to be restricted either through a typelist of preset ranges (such as next 30 days) or through a start and end date.

    Very similar to DateCriterionChoice, but DateCriterionChoice supports configurable search. (See the Configuration Guide for details of customizing search screens.)
